resources.string: iClean App is an initiative by students of GLBITM to report Malba and Garbage Dumps across the City

As we know along with the day by day increasing population,cleanliness is a factor which is being overlooked nowadays. iClean is a step taken towards cleanliness and to come over it. Being a volunteer will not only help us to keep the environment clean, but will mark as a motivational factor for other people also.
